SOOOOO AMAZING my GF got me into this game at the beginning of our relationship and every since its better than fortnite any other popular game since our relationship it gives me bo2 days vibes and we all know how great that felt i say this game is consistently changing with new things and its f>ucking AMAZING. started on ps4 half way through our relationship Been together for a year and change now honestly brought us together10% more do recommend.

Where do I start, this game provides a non-stop roller coaster of enjoyment. Whether you are playing killer or survivor (even solo survivor) the game will provide you with a decent paced exciting match, it always feels like you are progressing which is a good way to keep players interested, the progression system works like a charm allowing you to spend your "bloodpoints" that you have accumulated through games on any character regardless of which character was used to acquire them. The matches are a good length usually around 20 to 35 mins, but the game manages to keep you constantly engaged. All in all the game is very satisfying especially after the years of updates and re-balancing that was very much so needed from the initial release build.

Reinstalling the entire game every time there is an update becomes tiresome.
+ The files write incredibly slow compared to any other game i own on steam.

Hay una realidad. Behavior no entiende a su juego , ni mucho menos a su comunidad. ¿ como es posible que el contenido fan made sea tan profesional al lado de este diseño del free fire ? Todo a lo que me refiero abarca en la música , ambientación , diseño y jugabilidad. El nuevo asesino es literalmente un cantante de k - pop que se gesto en la colaboración con un productor de los bts ¿ COMO ALGUIEN DEL MUNDO POP KOREANO , PUEDE TENER LA AUTORIDAD Y VALIDES CREATIVA DE COOPERAR CON UN JUEGO QUE SUPUESTAMENTE ES DE "TERROR"?

¿ queres darme un personaje humano , en el mundo de la musica y conservando un aspecto bizarro ? Un cantante de heavy metal te lo creo por ejemplo. Es fácil asociar la violencia en la música pesada del colectivo popular.

Cuando en tu juego tenes una entidad babilonica que vomita sobre los supervivientes , una cazadora salvaje de humanos , un doctor que juega con los niveles de locura , una bruja canibal o un espiritu japones nacido del odio y necesidad de venganza ¿ por que me tiene que impresionar un oriental fachero que tira cuchillos con luces led ? Esto es lamentable.

ORIGINALLY I would recommend this game, 2020 and earlier. Now? The toxic community is just ridiculous. Killers purposely play like the biggest dicks, and while I get that it's meta, they face camp and or tunnel you out and make it absolutely unbearable. "Get good", can't be better than a killer who face camps. Literally, the community is just beyond toxic now and it's ridiculous, I can't even have fun with friends on it anymore.

Its fun but play with friends

This is really a mixed game, its kind of difficult to place it at a solid number. It *can* be fun to play, depending on if you play killer, survivor or with friends. It often feels like its unbalanced, with everyone using the same perks in most games, which can definitely make it less fun. It frequently has bugs and moments where you should have gotten a hit and dont get it, and vice versa. 

Do I like to play it? Yes. Is it a fun game? Not really, I question my sanity every time I open it up. Should you get it? If you like addicting grindy games and being angry absolutely.

Edit: After the MMR update and playing longer as killer, I dont recommend it. The game has gotten less and less fun due to developer decisions and nerf upon nerf of killers. The longer you play, the more it becomes a 'survivors bully the killer' experience. Due to this, it makes it unfun for survivors as well, as now one of the few viable ways to play is to tunnel/camp.

 In 2019/20 games would be 20 minutes long, you would get a few good chases and even if you lost it would still be an okay experience. Now the killer experience is in 5 minutes all the gens are done, you get 1-2 hooks and the survivors teabag you at the exit gate.
Its a great game but loses all fun the higher rank you go. like i love being a little competitive but its fustrating dealing with other survivors who tend to take the game to serious.
It's alot of fun until you get the sweaty killers

bueno voy unas 400 horas y podria decir que es un juego muy bueno, actualmente lo juego solo, con amigos claramente es mas entretenido aun, la ambietacion esta bien, las mecanicas bien, a veces suelen haber bugs como en cualquier juego pero siempre estas ahi para arreglarlos, nunca dejan de actualizar el juego, estan  al dia con el juego y muchas cosas mas a favor, si le buscas algo malo, podria decirte que mientras vas jugando vas viendo partidas injustas que te dan ganas de ir a la casa de la persona y romperle la pc, y uno que otro hitbox mentiroso pero luego no hay nada mas de malo a mi parecer, solo eso :D
Esse jogo é muito bom, porém mal otimizado!

A very unique game, the devs are active on socials and always pumping out new content and improvements such as accessibility. There is so much to learn, it is not pay-to-win (there is so much you can do and earn without paying for DLCs right away). I am not a horror fan, yet i still love this game. I havent seen anything like it! There is good lore behind chapters and characters. of course there are always things to improve, fix and change, notably some very problematic leatherface cosmetics. I play this game casually, i don't have many hours in it so far, but even as a beginner, it is really enjoyable (as long as you dont allow yourself to get tilted over small things) which is the same for all games imo. This game is getting better and better with constant new updates from the devs. There is so much i could say about DBD. Do recommend!!
honestly its just fun being better than the killer
